about.description:
MACE provides fast and accurate machine learning interatomic
potentials with higher order equivariant message passing. This
repository contains the MACE reference implementation developed
by Ilyes Batatia, Gregor Simm, and David Kovacs.
about.summary: MACE - Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing.

about.description:
MACE provides fast and accurate machine learning interatomic
potentials with higher order equivariant message passing. This
repository contains the MACE reference implementation developed
by Ilyes Batatia, Gregor Simm, and David Kovacs.
about.summary: MACE - Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing.

name: pymace
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pymace" %}
{% set version = "0.3.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/ACEsuit/mace/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0a1f92ba800767b92266a1f66631f891a60247a90ff3b5e06680795e0c11284c

build:
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0
  noarch: python

requirements:
  build:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - pytorch >=1.12
    - e3nn =0.4.4
    - numpy
    - opt_einsum
    - ase
    - torch-ema
    - prettytable
    - matplotlib-base
    - pandas
    - matscipy

test:
  imports:
    - mace
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/ACEsuit/mace
  summary: 'MACE - Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing.'
  description: |
    MACE provides fast and accurate machine learning interatomic 
    potentials with higher order equivariant message passing. This 
    repository contains the MACE reference implementation developed 
    by Ilyes Batatia, Gregor Simm, and David Kovacs.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  doc_url: https://github.com/ACEsuit/mace
  dev_url: https://github.com/ACEsuit/mace

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
